snippet.title: How to reduce the number of ads in Gmail
snippet.description: You canâ€™t stop Google from scanning your inbox or serving you ads, but you can opt out of receiving personalized ads in Gmail. And you can eliminate one prominent ad banner altogether.

snippet.title: Reduce data usage, increase speed with Chrome extension
snippet.description: Stuck with a slow connection? A new Chrome extension can speed up your Web browsing by routing traffic through Google's servers.

snippet.title: Could electronically controlled drugs reduce side effects?
snippet.description: Researchers say they can zap implants with electrical currents to release specific amounts of medication to targeted areas of the body.

snippet.title: How to reduce data usage with Chrome for iOS
snippet.description: Google wants to help you cut back on the amount of data your iOS device uses while browsing the Web using Chrome.

snippet.title: Personal Zen app promises to reduce stress in 25 minutes
snippet.description: This free game has science in its corner. But it's missing something else: fun.

snippet.title: Alcatel-Lucent reportedly to reduce workforce by 10,000 jobs
snippet.description: The struggling network equipment maker will cut its workforce by about 14 percent in an effort to trim $1 billion in costs, European newspapers report.

snippet.title: How to reduce background motion, Parallax on iOS 7
snippet.description: Getting motion sickness from the background moving on iOS 7? Here's how you can reduce the amount of motion.

snippet.title: 11 ways to reduce Android data usage (pictures)
snippet.description: Avoid overage charges with these 11 handy tips for reducing Android data usage.

snippet.title: Reduce the risk of TVs falling on children (podcast)
snippet.description: About 17,000 children are admitted to the emergency room each year as a result of TVs falling on them, a recent study found. Larry Magid talks with Ryan Hagberg of Sanus about the dangers and some ways to reduce risk.

snippet.title: Foxconn looks to branch out, reduce reliance on Apple
snippet.description: The company is reportedly considering bringing software offerings to the devices it makes, as well as expanding the kind of products it makes.
